body:
Internal Release Notes

Features and Enhancements

CMS Medicare Advantage Adequacy Overrides
  • Now, county-level overrides have been incorporated into the global specifications to improve the accuracy of the determining whether a network model passes the CMS adequacy requirements.
Adequacy Specifications
  • Now, the CMS Medicare Advantage – 2023 global adequacy specification is available within Network360.
  • Now, we will support only the most recent two years of the CMS Standards as indicated by the 2021 or 2023 global CMS Medicare Advantage Adequacy Specifications.
  • Now, the CMS importer will accept each region type’s appropriate minimum success percentage.
  • Updated the green confirmation message wording which displays when a standard within an adequacy specification has been saved.
  • Updated the description on the left side of the General Properties section to better explain adequacy specifications.
Settings
  • Now, users can identify which specialty mapping is configured for competitive access as indicated by the gavel icon on the Project Settings page and within the specialty mapping dropdown selection list.
Adequacy
  • Now, within the dropdown list if adequacy specifications, the categories are listed in the following order: Global Specification, My Specifications, Other Specifications.
  • Now, on the Analysis Results page, the geography dropdown field is filtered to geographic areas contained within the population file used to create the analysis.
  • Updated the PDF export to include a page listing all the analysis criteria.
  • Now, when the there is no data in the selected geographic area, a message will display instead of blank gauges.
  • Updated the export email and blue notification message to include geography criteria. Also, updated the field label to be Adequacy Specification (instead of Accessibility Specification).
  • Updated field labels and columns within Adequacy and Accessibility for better consistency when appropriate.
Broker Tools
  • Now, the Broker Tools menu includes Accessibility to improve navigation through Network360 for brokers.

Fixed Issues

Settings
  • Project Settings > Tags: Fixed issue that the user could click twice to confirm the deletion of a user or enterprise tag.
Adequacy
  • Fixed font color issue for the adequacy specification information message so that it will always display in black font.
  • Removed excess characters that displayed within the specialty tooltip when the name of the specialty included an ampersand.
  • Fixed the issue within the PDF export that sometimes a blank page appeared between the Overview and Map pages. Now, there are no extra blank pages.
  • Updated the table of zip code region types to be the most recent Census Core Based Statistical Area (CBSA) region classifications.
Adequacy Specifications
  • Updated the required field message for missing number of providers.
  • Fixed when the informative message regarding the specialty mapping selection appears. Now it appears only when the selected specialty mapping is not enabled for competitive access in the selected project.
